question:
Which among the following statements about Mount Fuji is/are correct?
  1. It is the highest mountain in Japan
  2. It is an extinct volcano
  3. It is one of the Japan's Three Holy Mountains.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Mount Fuji is the highest mountain in Japan with an elevation of 3776 metres. It is the seventh-highest peak of an island on Earth. It is an active stratovolcano that last erupted from 1707 to 1708. It is one of the Japan's Three Holy Mountains along with Mount Tate and Mount Haku.
